# Government Tender Announcement - Mountain Training, Accommodations, and Advisory Services
## Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a training facility in Western Canada to provide specialized mountain training, accommodations, and advisory services to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).

### Description
The selected facility must offer on-site or within a 20 km radius, accommodations for a minimum of 30 and up to 35 CAF members participating in Mountain Training in Western Canada. The requirements include:

* Classrooms and meeting space
* Range training facilities
* Mountain advisory services
* Transportation services to remote areas
